## CLIConfigurationSpec.saveInputRequestData property

Whether to save the input request data (headers, method, URL) when creating a new mock.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
readonly saveInputRequestData?: boolean;
```

## Remarks

The default value of the global `saveInputRequestData` setting is `true`<!-- -->.

It can be changed at request level in the [hook](./kassette.configurationspec.hook.md) method through [mock.setSaveInputRequestData](./kassette.imock.setsaveinputrequestdata.md)<!-- -->.
